param.name: show_searchphrase
param.label: Show combination methods
param.description: Display the methods of combining the search words, so that user can set his/her prefered method

param.name: default_searchphrase
param.label: Default combination method
param.description: Default method of combining the search words

param.name: minchars
param.label: Minimum length
param.description: Minimum character length the search words are allowed to have

param.name: maxchars
param.label: Maxmum length
param.description: Maximum characters length the search words are allowed to have

param.name: cantypes
param.label: Allow users to select
param.description: Allow users the content types they want to include in their search

param.name: fieldtypes
param.label: Limit to types
param.description: What content types the search will include. NOTE: the above option will be LIMITED to display ONLY the type selected here

param.name: autodisplayextrafields
param.label: Advanced Search Box
param.description: If this is disabled. Then a clickable text will appear to allow user to toggle the advanced search box on/off.

param.name: listfields
param.label: Add Field
param.description: Please select fields to help you with 'Fields' textarea below.

param.name: search_fields
param.label: Advanced Search Fields
param.description: Enter extra field names, that you want to be included in the your search form. The will appear in the advanced search box. You can separate each field by comma(,).

param.name: show_operator
param.label: Allow users to select
param.description: Allow user to select how to combine the Basic and Advanced Search Boxes. Options will be ANY (logical or) and BOTH (logical and)

param.name: default_operator
param.label: Default value
param.description: Default behavior for combining the Basic and Advanced Search boxes. Select ANY (logical or) orBOTH (logical and). NOTE: this can be overriden by the user of the form.

param.name: show_searchordering
param.label: Allow users to select
param.description: Allow users to select the ordering of the search results

param.name: show_searchareas
param.label: Show ALL Search Areas
param.description: Allow the user to select and search other areas of the website content, e.g. like weblinks, user contacts, etc

param.name: default_searchordering
param.label: Default value
param.description: Default ordering for sorting the results of the search

param.name: show_section
param.label: Show section
param.description: Display section for each result. Note, this usually should be disabled since all FLEXIcontent items are placed in a single section

param.name: show_text
param.label: Show description
param.description: Display for each result its description text

param.name: show_date
param.label: Show creation date
param.description: Display for each result its creation date
